original_title: Shehan Semasinghe to represent SL at Spring Meetings Of IMF-World Bank
original_body_lines: State Minister of Finance Shehan Semasinghe is scheduled to represent Sri Lanka at the 2023 Spring Meetings of the World Bank Group (WBG) and the International Monetary Fund (IMF).
Spring Meetings are scheduled to take place in Washington DC from 10th to 16th of April.
The Spring Meetings will be attended by finance ministers and central bankers from across the world.

"Looking forward to representing Sri Lanka at the IMF World Bank  2023 Spring Meetings starting 10th April. Great opportunity to enhance cooperation with our international partners to ensure debt sustainability and to further the progress we have made towards economic recovery," he tweeted.(DSB)
